author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:
Removed unused sub-package RecoEgamma/Examples.
Purely technical PR. No physics change is expected.
Addresses this issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36590

#### PR validation:
CMSSW compiles.
Checked that the following worked successfully:
`runTheMatrix.py -l 11834.0`

This PR is not a backport.
Backport not needed.
title: [EGM] Remove unused sub-package RecoEgamma/Examples
